info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 2:56PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Berkshire, northeastern Columbia and southeastern Rensselaer Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 256 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Pownal to Nassau. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads. Locations impacted include... Pittsfield, North Adams, Nassau, Adams, Williamstown, Cheshire, Stephentown, New Lebanon, Florida, Hancock, New Ashford, Berkshire, Lanesborough, Canaan, East Nassau, Hairpin Turn, Barkerville, Greylock, Soldiers Memorial Field and West Stephentown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for western Massachusetts...and east central New York.
